sentences.english: Once he got rich,he flung aside his old freinds.
sentences.chinese: 他有钱后就立即抛弃了旧友。

sentences.english: My old friend Harrison, had lived in the Mediterranean for years before he returned to England.
sentences.chinese: 哈利逊是我的旧友，侨居地中海多年，近返英国。

sentences.english: He was addressing a card to an old family friend.
sentences.chinese: 他正在给一位家庭旧友写卡片。

sentences.english: We went to "melody"to have a party with old friends last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 周末，因为旧友重逢，我们晚上去麦乐迪唱歌。

sentences.english: And is even better for starting new relationships or adding needed fire into existing ones.
sentences.chinese: 你可以认识新人，也可以对旧友们之间增加些火花。

sentences.english: Dirk cast away his old friends.
sentences.chinese: 德克发财时，抛弃了旧友。

sentences.english: Whevern I heared the news that someone of these friends was gone, I would be sad for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 我每当听到一个旧友死去的消息时候，总要惆怅多时。

sentences.english: That's nice I meet several friends in my childhood, they all have good developement nowaday.
sentences.chinese: 很开心遇见了几位儿时旧友，他们现在都发展得好好。

sentences.english: You might, for example, deep-six an unpleasant letter from a former friend.
sentences.chinese: 比如，对一封旧友的讨厌的来信，你可以把它丢弃。

sentences.english: Old books are like old friends. Once lost，they can never be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 旧书跟旧友一样，一旦失去就不能再得。

sentences.english: Hard to gather the old ones, township far childhood fence wrinkle heart.
sentences.chinese: 难聚儿时旧友，乡远凭栏心皱。

sentences.english: A rare friend is from girlhood friend exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 少有的知己也是自少女时期交往的旧友。

definition: old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
